body.name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo, EDJO 2.4G Full-Sized Ergonomic Computer Keyboard with Wrist Rest and 3 Level DPI Adjustable Wireless Mouse for Windows, Mac OS Desktop/Laptop/PC

features: 【ERGONOMIC WIRELESS KEYBOARD MOUSE COMBO】EDJO Full-sized wireless keyboard is ergonomically designed with Palm Rest and folding holder that can keep it at an optimum slope，prevent your wrists from hurting while long sessions of typing. Keyboard is also designed with anti-slide pads so it will stay in place when you're typing quickly. NOTE: THE USB RECEIVER IS IN THE BATTERY COMPARTMENT OF THE KEYBOARD, YOU CAN FIND IT WHEN OPEN THE KEYBOARD BATTERY COVER.

【PLUG & PLAY 2.4G WIRELESS CONNECTION】One 2.4 GHz USB receiver can connect both the keyboard and mouse, can also be used separately, plug & play, no need to download any software. 2.4 GHz wireless provides a powerful and reliable connection up to 33 feet(10m) without any delays.

【AUTOMATIC POWER SAVING FUNCTION】The EDJO wireless keyboard and mouse combo has the function of automatically entering the power-saving state. When you stop using the keyboard more than 30 minutes, stop using the mouse more than 25 seconds, they will enter sleep mode respectively to save power. This feature greatly extends the battery life, you can click any button to activity the device. The keyboard need 1 x AA battery, the mouse need 1 x AA battery. (Battery Not Included)

【WIRELESS OPTICAL MOUSE】The mouse was optical design, even on some smooth surfaces, precise control can be obtained. 3-level adjustable DPI (800/1200/1600) allows you to choose your favorite moving speed of cursor. In addition, this wireless mouse is symmetry design, no matter you are Right handed Left handed, both hands are available, suitable for all people.

【UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY & AFTER-SALES SERVICE】This wireless keyboard and mice combo compatible with windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/X, Mac and other operating system. Works well with desktops, Chrome-book, PC, Laptop, Computer and more. If you encounter any problems during use, please contact us via Amazon email, we will provide a satisfactory solution.
body.description: Wireless Keyboard With Comfortable Palm Rest Protect Your Wrist From Injury The keyboard with palm rest is designed to protect your wrist from injury during long-term typing. If you are a person who uses the keyboard for a long time, you should undoubtedly choose this Intergrated palm rest keyboard to protect your wrist. The bottom of the keyboard are also equipped with a foldable feet, so that you can adjust the most comfortable angle for typing. One USB Receiver Can Contect Both The Keyboard and Mouse. Quiet Crater-switch Spill-resistant Design The Optical Mouse With 3 Adjustable DPI(800/1200/1600).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EDJO EDJO is a professional computer peripheral equipment manufacturer with more than 15 years of history, with a development team and a factory. We are committed to the development and production of wireless keyboards, wireless mice, gaming mechanical keyboards and other computer peripheral products. We used to only sell wholesale in offline stores, and now we are starting to sell online. Choose EDJO products, you will find that it is worthwhile and you will love with this brand. Wireless Keyboard With Comfortable Palm Rest Protect Your Wrist From Injury The keyboard with palm rest is designed to protect your wrist from injury during long-term typing. If you are a person who uses the keyboard for a long time, you should undoubtedly choose this Intergrated palm rest keyboard to protect your wrist. The bottom of the keyboard are also equipped with a foldable feet, so that you can adjust the most comfortable angle for typing. One USB Receiver Can Contect Both The Keyboard and Mouse. Quiet Crater-switch Spill-resistant Design The Optical Mouse With 3 Adjustable DPI(800/1200/1600).

2 in 1 USB Receiver One USB receiver can connect both the keyboard and mouse, without taking up more USB ports. Note: Keyboard and mouse can also be used separately. Quiet Crater-switch This wireless keyboard with crater-switch design and anti-oxidation Sealed membrane, greatly extend the life of the keyboard. 13 Multimedia Shortcuts EDJO wireless keyboard has 13 multimedia shortcuts that can easily to instant access music, volume, browser, email, etc.

Storage Location of The USB Receiver The USB receiver is stored in the keyboard battery compartment, you can find it when you open the keyboard battery cover. 3 Adjustable DPI(800/1200/1600) The mouse has 3 DPI（800/1200/1600） for you to choose, you can choose your favorite cursor movement speed by adjusting the DPI. Wireless Keyboard Indicator There are Number Lock indicator/ Caps Lock indicator/ Power indicator in the upper right corner of the keyboard, let you know the working status of the keyboard at any time

IMPORTANT NOTE Copy Shortcut Buttons Combination in Mac System： Win + CPaste Shortcut Buttons Combination in Mac System： Win + VCopy Shortcut Buttons Combination in Windows and others System： Ctrl + CPaste Shortcut Buttons Combination in Windows and others System： Ctrl + V

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable to type
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo, and I have to give it a solid 5-star review. This combo has exceeded my expectations in several ways:1. **Wireless Convenience**: The freedom from cords is a game-changer. It not only declutters my workspace but also allows me to sit comfortably at a distance from my computer.2. **Typing Comfort**: The keyboard has a comfortable layout with responsive keys. It's a pleasure to type on, and the absence of a cord makes it even more enjoyable.3. **Smooth Precision**: The wireless mouse is incredibly precise and tracks smoothly on various surfaces. It's responsive, which is crucial for productivity and gaming.4. **Easy Setup**: Setting up the combo was a breeze. Just plug in the USB receiver, and it's ready to go. No complicated installation or drivers needed.5. **Long Battery Life**: I'm impressed with how long the batteries last. I don't have to worry about constantly changing them, which is a big plus.6. **Sturdy Build**: Both the keyboard and mouse feel well-made and durable. They've held up well to regular use.7. **Value for Money**: Considering the quality and performance, this combo offers excellent value for the price.In summary, the Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo has made my computing experience more convenient, comfortable, and efficient. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable wireless input solution. It's a 5-star product all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the Best I Have Had
reviews.reviewText: I have had this keyboard for over a month now. I previously owned the Logitech K800 (had several over the years and loved them) and then went to a Logitech MK. With the MK I wanted to like it but it was hard to get used to the keys but more importantly after three month I had to have it plugged in after a few hours as the charge was horrible. I miss the backlighting but I just love this keyboard. The keys are a little noisy but after a while I don't even notice it. One of my main things was that I wanted a built in palm rest as I rarely use it on a table, usually I have it on my lap. I cannot say enough about this keyboard it far exceeded my expectations. Another feature that is wonderful is that you don't have an on and off switch. I goes into sleep if you are not typing for a bit and there is no delay once you start typing. It is very simple and extremely light but it works just perfectly for me. I do admit I have a Logitech mouse that I prefer so I need two usbs. The one that came with this keyboard is okay but the size is a bit small for my hand. For the price especially you cannot go wrong with this keyboard!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great For Touch-Typists, But That's Not Me
reviews.reviewText: OK - I love this keyboard's feel and action. The mouse is super comfortable. It's a super great keyboard and mouse combo.Just two things keep me from being able to keep it. 1 - The letters printed on the keys are in the upper left corner of each key, they aren't centered on the key. I'm a serious hunt and peck typist and I found myself hitting multiple keys when my fat fingers followed my eye's guidance to where the printed letter on the key is. If you can type without looking at the keyboard, then this would not be an issue at all. And I probably would have kept it hoping my eye/hand coordination would get used to it. But this keyboard's F keys aren't multi-function. On my old keyboard I could hold down an Fn key while hitting the F3 key, and my computer's volume would go up. Fn + F4 and I could mute. I use this a lot so I couldn't keep the keyboard. One other bit of weirdness - the WIN key said "WIN" instead of having the little Windows symbol. My eyes are trained to find those four little squares. This made it oddly slow using the WIN shortcuts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great performance and value
reviews.reviewText: I bought this wireless keyboard and mouse combo to use with my work laptop. I was struggling with back pain and the wireless set up has enabled me to re-arrange my desk space, and set up a more ergonomic posture for long days behind the desk.The best part is now I can just grab my laptop and walk away from the desk without messing around with any cords, and the keyboard and mouse are ready for me as soon as I bring the laptop back to my desk, with no messing around with cords.It was super easy to set up--Just plug in the USB and it's ready to use. With just 1 USB plug for both the mouse and keyboard, it frees up an extra USB on my laptop to also charge my phone.The keyboard works great. No issues at all, and the key response is satisfying, but not loud. The mouse also reliably works as it should, no problems.To conclude, I do recommend this product, and I would buy it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for everyday tasks
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this mouse and keyboard so that I could use my Mac with an additional monitor. They work amazingly! The clicks of the keys are very satisfying to use and provide a tasteful thud. It allows me to get my work done in a zen groove. I would highly recommend this for daily tasks and at home work, but it will surely get the job done for any gamer who is in need of a high quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Simple, budget friendly keyboard and mouse with poor button response
reviews.reviewText: I've given this keyboard and mouse combo a fair chance. I purchased this keyboard in mid- July of 2023, today it is August 28th, 2023. This keyboard has my feels a little scrambled. This keyboard and mouse set offers a decent keyboard and mouse for the price point. However- The buttons on the keyboard feel... Soft? I'm not sure how else to describe them... In order to not"skip a letter when typing I have to apply more finger force than I have with any other keyboard. I don't want a keyboard to be so responsive that winking at it will hit a key but maaaah goodness - Trying to type on this keyboard is as exhausting as kneading dough or playing bass. So! If your vibe is wanting to type as aggressively as possible for every sentence or if you want a finger workout - Look no further. This is your keyboard.Summary: Not bad for the price. Typing is a workout and you might misspell words if you don't button smash. The mouse is a mouse, no issues there.PS - The only reasons I added the dates at the top is because I wanted to see if this keyboard was still within the return window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these for our sales office. They work well and were very reasonably priced. I would buy again.

I bought this to replace my corded gaming keyboard. The response times are excellent however it does not have any bells and whistles (volume control or hot keys) and is just a straight forward 101 keyboard and mouse. If those extra features are important to you, this may not be the keyboard for you however if you are looking for a comfortable replacement for a corded or older wireless keyboard that includes a standard wheel mouse with the forward and back buttons, this is a great product. I have had this for a while now and still on the first set of batteries with lots of life left in them.
The keyboard had a lot of lag compared to a wired keyboard. The mouse was OK but also suffered from lag.
If you like a regular size keyboard, this one is fitting just right. It feels correct, is quiet and is working as should. I have not used it for gaming and we'll see about the battery life.
Don’t forget to get two AA batteries. Connected easily with usb attachment. Came with instructions on how to do that and where the usb connector is. A little flimsy but does the trick.

reviews.reviewTitle: This product is suitable on my work need.
reviews.reviewText: I like everything, soft and very convenient to use at home or work from home
